sentences.en: ‘Hurry up Jonathan!’ ‘Pardon?’ ‘I said hurry up!’
sentences.cn: “快点，乔纳森！”“你说什么啊？”“我说快点！”

sentences.en: "I beg your pardon?" she giggled.
sentences.cn: “您可以重复一遍吗？”她咯咯地笑着说。

sentences.en: A wilful fault has no excuse and deserves no pardon.
sentences.cn: 不能宽恕故意犯下的错误.

sentences.en: He asked her pardon for having deceived her.
sentences.cn: 他欺骗了她，向她请求原谅。

sentences.en: He craved the teacher's pardon.
sentences.cn: 他恳求老师原谅他。

sentences.en: He knelt before the king and asked for pardon.
sentences.cn: 他跪在国王面前请求赦罪.

sentences.en: He was granted a presidential pardon.
sentences.cn: 他得到了总统的赦免。

sentences.en: I beg your pardon ( but would you repeat what you said )?
sentences.cn: 对不起,请你再讲一遍好 吗 ?

sentences.en: I beg your pardon for intruding.
sentences.cn: 请原谅我不请自来。

sentences.en: I beg your pardon, pray continue.
sentences.cn: 抱歉，请继续。

sentences.en: I beg your pardon, what you say is not exactly correct.
sentences.cn: 对不起, 你说的话并不完全对.

sentences.en: I earnestly pray for your pardon.
sentences.cn: 我恳切地请求你原谅。

sentences.en: I hope you will pardon me for doing so.
sentences.cn: 我希望你原谅我这样做。

sentences.en: I was impolite and I do beg your pardon.
sentences.cn: 我失礼了，真对不起。

sentences.en: It's enough to make you wet yourself, if you'll pardon the expression.
sentences.cn: 这足以吓得你尿裤子了，请原谅我这么说。

sentences.en: Pardon me for bothering you with such a small matter.
sentences.cn: 请原谅我为这点小事麻烦你.

sentences.en: Pardon me for interrupting you.
sentences.cn: 对不起,打搅你了.

sentences.en: Pardon me for interrupting.
sentences.cn: 对不起打断一下.

sentences.en: Pardon me, I have to use the john.
sentences.cn: 对不起, 我要到洗手间去一下.

sentences.en: She asked him to pardon her rudeness.
sentences.cn: 她请求他原谅她的无礼.

sentences.en: That, if you'll pardon my saying so, is neither here nor there.
sentences.cn: 恕我直言，那根本就不重要。

sentences.en: The place was, if you'll pardon the expression , a dump.
sentences.cn: 那个地方，请恕我直言，简直是个垃圾场。

sentences.en: The two spies were pardoned yesterday by the President.
sentences.cn: 那两名间谍昨天得到了总统的赦免。

sentences.en: They lobbied the government on his behalf and he was granted a presidential pardon.
sentences.cn: 他们为他游说政府，他因之得到了总统特赦。

sentences.en: to ask/grant/receive a pardon
sentences.cn: 请求 / 准予 / 获得赦免

sentences.en: Walter begged her pardon for all the pain he had caused her.
sentences.cn: 沃尔特请求她原谅自己给她造成那么多痛苦。

phrases.tran_cn: ［表示礼貌地道歉］对不起，请原谅
原谅(或宽恕)某人(做)某事(如犯错误等) [亦作 pardon someone something]

trans.tran_cn: （用于请求别人重复某事）什么，请再说一遍
trans.tran_en: used to say ‘sorry’ after you have made an impolite sound such as a  burp

trans.tran_cn: 请再说一遍；抱歉，对不起
trans.tran_en: used when you want someone to repeat something because you did not hear it

trans.tran_cn: 请重复一遍，请再说一遍〔没听清对方的话希望重复一遍时的用语〕
trans.tran_en: used when you want someone to repeat something because you did not hear it

trans.tran_cn: 饶恕，原谅，赦免，[宗]免罪符
trans.tran_en: used to say ‘sorry’ after you have made an impolite sound such as a  burp
to forgive someone for behaving badly

trans.tran_cn: 原谅， 宽恕； 对不起
trans.tran_en: to forgive someone for behaving badly
